title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - No More Orphans: Bringing Work and People Data Into Decisions with MCP (ISV319)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 不再孤立：通过 MCP 将工作和人员数据纳入决策 (ISV319)
abstract: Managers make dozens of high-impact decisions every week — but too often, work and people data is missing from the table especially in ad hoc decisions. The result? Strategy built on partial context, disconnected systems, and underused insights. In this session, we’ll explore how Visier’s Model Context Protocol (MCP) server changes that. By transforming fragmented HR and workforce data into a unified, AI-ready semantic layer, MCP lets organizations combine people data with critical business data, automate context delivery, and surface insights where decisions happen.
abstract_cn: 管理者每周要做出数十个高影响力的决策——但工作和人员数据往往缺失，尤其是在临时决策中。结果如何？基于片面背景、系统割裂和洞察利用不足而制定的战略。在本次会议中，我们将探讨 Visier 的模型上下文协议（MCP）服务器如何改变这一现状。通过将分散的人力资源和劳动力数据转换为统一的、AI 就绪的语义层，MCP 让组织能够将人员数据与关键业务数据相结合，自动化上下文交付，并在决策发生的地方呈现洞察。
